alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 2:45PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS... SOUTHEASTERN BEAUREGARD...NORTHEASTERN CALCASIEU AND SOUTHWESTERN ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 330 PM CST... At 245 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moss Bluff, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Westlake, Welsh, Iowa, Kinder, Fenton, Reeves, Moss Bluff, Buller, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Leblanc, and Lacassine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 26 and 55. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis
